name: Alex
intro: Alex is a photography service based website where clients can find different types of photography services. The goal was to create a full stack CRUD operation website.
webstack_explanation: Build the projects using React.js because it's server side rendering and dynamic routing. For backend I used Express.js as it is easy to make api to build applications. I also used MongoDB for database because of it's high performance speed. MongoDB makes queries much faster, and returns all the necessary information in a single call to the database.
problems: The main goal of the projects was to create a CRUD operation. As I learn about CRUD operation I tried to implemented it. Creating a backend api call for website was a challenging. I struggle a lot because of my first time working with Express.js. But whenever I was stuck I google it and after some time found the solution and executed it.
